column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My mom and I ordered the Spinach Salad
column3: and a small Malnati Chicago classic pizza. The spinach salad was pretty average
column4: but I was still happy that we got a salad because the rest of our meal was so carby. It was nice to be able to eat something while waiting for the ~grand finale~. Nevertheless
column7: was delicious. It was kind of like it's own extra mini deep dish pizza with marinara sauce on the size
column8: and I definitely recommend it if you aren't planning to eat an entire pizza!
